name: UserConfiguration
description: User specific configuration for the Medplum application.

properties.name: UserConfiguration
properties.short: User specific configuration for the Medplum application.
properties.definition: User specific configuration for the Medplum application.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

properties.name: meta
properties.definition: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

properties.name: implicitRules
properties.definition: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

properties.name: language
properties.definition: The base language in which the resource is written.

properties.name: name
properties.definition: A name associated with the UserConfiguration.

properties.name: menu
properties.definition: Optional menu of shortcuts to URLs.

properties.name: name
properties.definition: The human friendly name of the link.

properties.name: target
properties.definition: The URL target of the link.

properties.name: name
properties.definition: The human friendly name of the link.

properties.name: criteria
properties.definition: The rules that the server should use to determine which resources to return.
properties.comment: The rules are search criteria (without the [base] part). Like Bundle.entry.request.url, it has no leading "/".

properties.name: option
properties.definition: User options that control the display of the application.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The unique identifier of the option.

properties.name: value[x]
properties.definition: Value of option - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](extensibility.html) for a list).

searchParameters.name: name
searchParameters.description: The name of the user configuration
